meanings.definition: Treat (a person or animal) with cruelty or violence.
meanings.sent1: The bully maltreats the smaller kids on the playground.
meanings.sent2: It is never okay to maltreat animals, they deserve kindness and care.
meanings.sent3: The villain in the movie always maltreats his henchmen, but they end up turning against him.
meanings.sent4: The storm maltreats the fragile branches, bending them under its powerful force.
meanings.sent5: The dictator maltreats his people, ruling with an iron fist and causing suffering for all.

meanings.sent1: Be careful not to maltreat the delicate equipment; it needs to be handled gently.
meanings.sent2: The old book was maltreated by being thrown around, now its pages are torn.
meanings.sent3: The chef maltreats the dough when he kneads it too roughly, resulting in tough bread.
meanings.sent4: The careless movers maltreat the furniture, causing scratches and dents.
meanings.sent5: The gardener knows not to maltreat the plants, as they need gentle care to thrive.
